author: Matt W
comment: Although the dev only shows this on circular watches, if you zoom out the analogue hands it works really well on square faced watches as well.  Love it on my Zen watch 2

reply.author: RAMZES.design
reply.content:
I'll add to app in GP some rectangle screen preview. 
Thx for comment and five stars!
